Here is the Printed kurta by Kremiza.Stylish Look Can Be Effortlessly Achieved By Wearing This FASHION DEPTH kurti.Double your fashion flair as you wear this Beautiful Kurti.It is a Crepe fabric kurta which makes it an apt choice for all season.it assures a soft and soothing touch against the skin.This pretty all season Kurti has a sexy boat Neck, Floral Print and A-line Style. Make you more beautiful, fashion, sexy and elegant. Occasions : Outdoor, Party, Cocktail, Vacation, Wedding, Dating, Evening or daily wear. This Kurti available in 5 Sizes: S, M, L,XL,XXL.and Visite our store page for more collection.

Country of Origin : India
